import axios from'axios';import{API_URL}from'../constants/constants';// http://localhost:8085/api/vnpay/make?vnp_Amount=1000000&vnp_Locale=vn&vnp_OrderInfo=Thanh+toan+don+hang&vnp_OrderType=topup&vnp_ReturnUrl=https%3a%2f%2fsandbox.vnpayment.vn%2ftryitnow%2fHome%2fVnPayReturn
export var makePaymentVnpay=function makePaymentVnpay(order){return axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/api/vnpay/make?vnp_Amount=").concat(order.vnp_Amount,"&vnp_Locale=vn&vnp_OrderInfo=").concat(order.vnp_OrderInfo,"&vnp_OrderType=250000&vnp_ReturnUrl=https%3a%2f%2fsandbox.vnpayment.vn%2ftryitnow%2fHome%2fVnPayReturn"));};//http://localhost:8085/api/vnpay/result?vnp_Amount=100000000&vnp_BankCode=NCB&vnp_BankTranNo=20210516085304&vnp_CardType=ATM&vnp_OrderInfo=Thanh+toan+don+hang&vnp_PayDate=20210516085241&vnp_ResponseCode=00&vnp_TmnCode=VMMBOT14&vnp_TransactionNo=13505299&vnp_TxnRef=10242996&vnp_SecureHashType=SHA256&vnp_SecureHash=702c26064a301f66a8f943994255598ca420bb008d2ba3544b47caa8105bb8b7
export var resultPaymentVnPay=function resultPaymentVnPay(order){return axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"api/vnpay/result?vnp_Amount=").concat(order.vnp_Amount,"&vnp_BankCode=").concat(order.vnp_BankCode,"&vnp_BankTranNo=").concat(order.vnp_BankTranNo,"&vnp_CardType=ATM&vnp_OrderInfo=").concat(order.vnp_OrderInfo,"&vnp_PayDate=").concat(order.vnp_PayDate,"&vnp_ResponseCode=").concat(order.vnp_ResponseCode,"&vnp_TmnCode=VMMBOT14&vnp_TransactionNo=").concat(order.vnp_TransactionNo,"&vnp_TxnRef=").concat(order.vnp_TxnRef,"&vnp_SecureHashType=SHA256&vnp_SecureHash=702c26064a301f66a8f943994255598ca420bb008d2ba3544b47caa8105bb8b7"));};// http://localhost:8085/api/vnpay/make?vnp_Amount=1000000&vnp_Locale=vn&vnp_OrderInfo=Thanh+toan+don+hang&vnp_OrderType=topup&vnp_ReturnUrl=https%3a%2f%2fsandbox.vnpayment.vn%2ftryitnow%2fHome%2fVnPayReturn
export var makePaymentZaloPay=function makePaymentZaloPay(order,params){return axios({method:'POST',data:order,params:{appuser:params.appuser,amount:params.amount,order_id:params.order_id},url:"".concat(API_URL,"/api/zalopay/create-order")});};export var getStatusByAppTransIDZaloPay=function getStatusByAppTransIDZaloPay(apptransid){return axios({method:'GET',url:"".concat(API_URL,"/api/zalopay/getstatusbyapptransid"),params:{apptransid:apptransid}});};// momo
export var makePaymentMomo=function makePaymentMomo(params){return axios({method:'POST',params:{amount:params.amount,order_id:params.order_id},url:"".concat(API_URL,"/api/momo/create-order")});};export var transactionStatusMomo=function transactionStatusMomo(params){return axios({method:'POST',params:{requestId:params.requestId,orderId:params.orderId},url:"".concat(API_URL,"/api/momo/transactionStatus")});};
